1007600.name: Fantasy Grounds - Meanders Map Pack: Meredark Jungle II (Map Pack)
1007600.description:
Meanders Map Pack: Meredark Jungle II

Delve deeper into the infamous Meredark, down to the Core of the Darklights, out to the Ocean Shores or up to the Tree Canopy in this new extension with 24 new jungle maps.
  • Assorted Ravines and Gorges
  • Meandering Jungle Pits
  • Mesozoic Tarpit
  • Intense, Low and Ravine Log Crossings
  • Archaeological Dig Site
  • Jungle Clearings
  • Beach to Jungle Blenders
  • Deep Road Caverns
  • Gold and Crystal Mines
  • Boiling Mud and Noxious Fumed Swamps
  • Treehouses among the Canopy
  • Waterfall Swingbridge Temple Entrance
  • Village Maps
Maps are sized specially for FG at 1350x900 and under 500 kb each to help prevent slow-down during play. DM Convenience is the focus with carefully labelled maps and several ways to access, use and choose the maps in this module. Use the VISUAL MAP SELECTION PANEL and pick your map from the thumbnails and yellow label by clicking on the pin. Or use the RANDOM ROLL TABLE - a d100 table to pick your destination at random.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
